dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1558 IH: Saving America’s Vulnerable Endangered Species Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Moran introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to provide that nonnative species in the United States shall not be treated as endangered species or threatened species for purposes of that Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Saving America’s Vulnerable Endangered Species Act or the SAVES Act.

section.header: Limitation on treatment of nonnative species in the United States as endangered species or threatened species

subsection.text: Section 13 of the Endangered Species Act of 1973 (relating to amendments to other laws, which have executed) is amended to read as follows:

section.header: Limitation on treatment of certain species as endangered species or threatened species

subsection.text: The species described in subsection (b) shall not be treated as endangered species or threatened species for purposes of this Act.
The species referred to in subsection (a) are species in the United States that are not native to the United States.
The table of contents in the first section of such Act is amended by striking the item relating to section 13 and inserting the following:

toc.toc-entry: Sec. 13. Limitation on treatment of certain species as endangered species or threatened species.
